title: Medallion, 5th–8th century
medium:
Medium: Warp; S-spun Z-twist linen. Wefts; S-spun wools
Technique: slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping
dimensions: H x W: 10.2 x 9 cm (4 in. x 3 9/16 in.)
description: Linear design within a deep curving viane and leaf frame.

tombstone.epitaph:
Medallion, 5th–8th century.
5th–8th century. Medium: Warp; S-spun Z-twist linen. Wefts; S-spun wools
Technique: slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-127.
